Congratulations to the graduating Class of 2021 at the Technical College of the Lowcountry! 

Now more than ever, our region and our nation need your drive, determination and skill. You’re a shining example of the American dream.

The Class of 2021 at Coastal Carolina University has overcome immense challenges to finally achieve what they've worked so hard for over the last four years. 
 
You took it all on in stride, and I can't express how proud you make us all, across South Carolina. Congratulations!

Congratulations to Furman's Class of 2021! It's been a long and unprecedented road to finally get your diploma, but it's certainly worth the struggle.

You're entering a world in desperate need of your talents and strengths, and I can't wait to see what you do.

To the Class of 2021 at College of Charleston: You make everyone in the Lowcountry so immensely proud.
 
You've worked tirelessly through unprecedented challenges to our region to get here, and you represent our best and brightest to the entire world. Congratulations! #GoCougars

In the interest of fairness, I want to say congratulations to the Class of 2021 at BOTH Clemson and USC!
 
You've been through so much this past year and worked so hard over the last four. But you've finally made it!
 
You make us all so proud to call ourselves South Carolinians.

Congrats to the Class of 2021 at SC State University! 

You stand on the shoulders of giants who overcame immense challenges to get where you are now. But, you've had to face down unique challenges of your own this past year to get here, and we're all so proud of you!

John D. Rockefeller could have paid off the entire US federal debt in his era. Today, Jeff Bezos could only cover about 6 months of interest payments. 1/4

Visitors can take advantage of the beautiful hiking trails, the kayak launch, & the new fishing pier that gives shore fishers access to the best walleye fishing on around.

The Detroit River International Wildlife Refuge is a culmination of decades of John’s work & the work of many others to create a special outdoor space for all to enjoy.
